en-US.summary: Get the latest tennis feeds from US OPEN, Australian Open, ATP World Tour, WTA Tennis and ESPN Tennis
examplePhrases: Alexa, Open tennis feeds to play US Open
Alexa, Open tennis feeds to play favorites
en-US.name: Tennis Feeds
en-US.description:
This skill provides the latest tennis feeds from US OPEN, Australian Open, ATP World Tour, WTA Tennis and ESPN Tennis. You can get the feeds by category, mark a particular category as a favorite, remove favorite, list all supported categories, get more details of a particular feed.

Invocation Name - tennis feeds
Just say "Open tennis feeds" or "Start tennis feeds"

To open the feeds for a particular category

Just say "Open category {category name}" or "Open {category name}

For example "Open US Open"

To mark a particular category as favorite

Just say "mark {Category} as favorite"

for example "mark ESPN Tennis as favorite"

To Remove a particular category from favorites

Just say "remove {Category} as favorite"

for example "remove ESPN Tennis as favorite"

To get supported categories
Just say "list categories" or "get category list"
